jmap_get_email.description:
Get full email content by ID. Returns headers, body, and attachments.

    Use email IDs from jmap_search_emails to retrieve full content.
    Includes plain text body, HTML body info, and attachment list.

    Args:
        params: JmapGetEmailInput containing:
            - email_id: Email ID to retrieve (required)
            - account: Email account (optional)
            - include_body: Include full body content (default True)
            - response_format: 'markdown' or 'json'

    Returns:
        Full email content with headers and body.
